Package kademlia.dht

Interface KadContent

All Known Implementing Classes:
DHTContentImpl
public interface KadContent
Any piece of content that needs to be stored on the DHT
Since:
20140224

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    KadContent fromSerializedForm​(byte[] data)
    Given the Content in byte format, read it
    long getCreatedTimestamp()
    Each content will have an created date This allows systems to know when to delete a content form his/her machine
    KademliaId getKey()  
    long getLastUpdatedTimestamp()
    Each content will have an update timestamp This allows the DHT to keep only the latest version of a content
    java.lang.String getOwnerId()  
    java.lang.String getType()  
    byte[] toSerializedForm()
    Each content needs to be in byte format for transporting and storage, this method takes care of that.

  • Method Details

    • getKey

      KademliaId getKey()
      Returns:
      NodeId The DHT key for this content

    • getType

      java.lang.String getType()
      Returns:
      String The type of content

    • getCreatedTimestamp

      long getCreatedTimestamp()
      Each content will have an created date This allows systems to know when to delete a content form his/her machine
      Returns:
      long The create date of this content

    • getLastUpdatedTimestamp

      long getLastUpdatedTimestamp()
      Each content will have an update timestamp This allows the DHT to keep only the latest version of a content
      Returns:
      long The timestamp of when this content was last updated

    • getOwnerId

      java.lang.String getOwnerId()
      Returns:
      The ID of the owner of this content

    • toSerializedForm

      byte[] toSerializedForm()
      Each content needs to be in byte format for transporting and storage, this method takes care of that. Each object is responsible for transforming itself to byte format since the structure of methods may differ.
      Returns:
      The content in byte format

    • fromSerializedForm

      KadContent fromSerializedForm​(byte[] data)
      Given the Content in byte format, read it
      Parameters:
      data - The object in byte format
      Returns:
      A new object from the given
